text: The Mitsubishi Xforce is a subcompact Crossover SUV made by Mitsubishi Motors since 2023. == History and Features == The Mitsubishi Xforce was debuted as a concept car called XFC concept it was showed in October 19 2022 in Ho Chi Minh City later at the Vietnam Auto Show in October 26 of the same year. it was debuted as a production car in Gaikindo Indonesia International Auto Show in August 10 2023. It started being produced in MMKi plant in Cikrang in Indonesia in October 2023 and according to Takao Kato Mitsubishi Motors current CEO Mitsubishi started working in a electric version that will may be launched outside Southeast Asia. the car has a 1.5 liter engine and a CVT transmission. == Markets == The Mitsubishi Xforce is currently sold in Indonesia Phillipines Vietnam and Brunei in Mexico Costa Rica and Egypt it is sold as the Mitsubishi Outlander Sport. == References == Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:Mitsubishi automobiles
title: Mitsubishi Xforce
